short_summary: Three (3) Junior Life Cycle Management Specialists for DND
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of three (3) Junior Life Cycle Management Specialists to provide support to the the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Fighters & Trainers) The provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services
tags: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) (Excludes requirements related to armament, R&D and R&O)
